comments:
Build 20011120.

- installed build 20011120
- ran it
- opened repository explorer in same perspective (Resource perspective)
- add ECLIPSE_HOME classpath variable
- loaded org.eclipse.ui project
- had the classpath wrong, so fixed it
- it rebuilt, since autobuild was on
- switched to Navigator view
- went for context menu
